item.title: Weekly Godot Japan 2023-01-12
item.description: ä»Šé€±ï¼ˆ2023å¹´1æœˆ5æ—¥ã€œ2023å¹´1æœˆ12æ—¥ï¼‰ã®Godot Engineã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’ãŠå±Šã‘ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã“ã®ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¯raindrop.ioã®ãƒ–ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ä»Šé€±è¿½åŠ ã•ã‚ŒãŸé–¢é€£æ€§ã®é«˜ã„ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ»ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ»ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ»ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ»ãŠã‚ˆã³ãã®ä»–ã‚’ã¾ã¨ã‚ã€è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«é…ä¿¡ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ãŠã™ã™ã‚ã‚„ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¢ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€Discussionã®ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¾ãŸã¯Godot Japan Discordã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼>ã«ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚Œã°åæ˜ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ğŸ¨ãƒãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒªã‚¢ãƒ« "How to make Breath Of The Wild style Climbing in Godot!" ã‚’ YouTube ã§è¦‹ã‚‹ In this video, I try an recreate the climbing system from the legend of Zelda: Breath of the wild in the Godot game engine! We go over my character controller and then the iterative design process I used to create the system in Godot! Source code for the project: https://github.com/LeonStansfield/Climbing_tutorial Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Leonstansfield0 And check out the game on Itch.io: https://leon-stansfield.itch.io/ Using particle shaders in #GodotEngine a pixel perfect disintegration effect can be created, here's an overview of how to create an Undertale like death effect#gamedev #tutorial #pixelart pic.twitter.com/XBpx6yjmSC — AstridsonğŸ’§ (@byastridson) January 6, 2023 ğŸ‘®å…¬å¼ Dev snapshot: Godot 4.0 beta 11 First snapshot of the year, Godot 4.0 beta 11! We took a bit longer to prepare this beta as there were a number of fairly big GDScript refactoring PRs (needed to fix many bugs), which we wanted to merge all at once.
